DOC.brief_title: Deferiprone Prevention Contrast-Induced Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.detailed_description: This trial evaluate whether treatment CRMD-001 ( unique formulation iron chelator , Deferiprone ) reduce incidence AKI subject CKD additional risk factor . Adult subject moderate severe CKD undergo coronary angiography PCI randomize either placebo CRMD-001 follow 90 day . Subjects receive 8 day randomize therapy start 1-3 hour prior angiography . The primary endpoint trial difference mean pair change panel sensitive renal biomarkers group . Differences renal cardiovascular clinical event also evaluate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2. eGFR < 60 ml/min/1.73 m2 3 . Presence least one additional risk factor : Diabetes Mellitus Age ≥ 75 year Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction ≤ 40 % 1 . EndStage Renal Disease 2 . Recent change serum creatinine 3 . Primary PCI STEMI 4 . Currently receive mechanical ventilation 5 . Severe heart failure cardiogenic shock 6 . Requirement inotropic support ( prior 30 day ) 7 . Sustained hypertension > = 200/110 8 . Subject expect live 90 day 9 . Anticipated use ioxaglate iohexol 10 .
